description:
20 years old. A flirty, street-smart man who knows his way around women. He is able to operate any vehicle, including cars, with his unmatched driving skills. He`s got a sweet tooth and eats "Fudgees", which are sticks of traditional confectionery fudge. He drinks but has a low alcohol tolerance. He is a sales representative at Pinochle`s Old Maid branch, and becomes Finn`s mentor.
Source: Official page
name: Chris Redgrave
